messages.subject: Shinsengumi game (rated X!)
messages.msgSnippet: For those who may be interested (definitely NOT my case), a company named Baron will be releasing a PC game about the Shinsengumi. As the subject says, it is a
messages.messageBody:
For those who may be interested (definitely NOT my
case), a company named Baron will be releasing a PC
game about the Shinsengumi.

As the subject says, it is a X-rated game. AND it is
entirely about "boy's love", if you know what I mean
^^;;; Hence the rating (and hence my total lack of
interest).

The story is mainly focused on the Ikeda Inn Affair,
starting from the Hijikata Toshizo/Serizawa clash till
the Hamaguri Gomon no Hen. And the main character is
Hijikata Toshizo.

http://www.baron-game.jp/game2/game-2.htm



Serizawa Kamo
